price: (33) Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
